member.name: M:ClearCanvas.ImageViewer.Core.Functions.MaximumIntensityProjection.ProjectOrthogonal(System.SByte*,System.SByte*,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Performs orthogonal maximum intensity projection on a subregion of a subsampled 3D volumetric slab, aggregating it into a single 2D planar image.
member.remarks: This overload allows specifying a specific subregion of the slab to be projected, thus allowing for a large slab to be split up into multiple independent subregions that can be processed in parallel on multiple threads.
member.param: The 3D volumetric slab to be projected. (Length must be exactly x ).
Buffer to receive the output 2D planar image. (Length must be exactly ).
The number of subsamples in the 3D volumetric slab.
The number of pixels per subsample in the 3D volumetric slab.
The offset, in pixels, into each subsample at which the projection will begin.
The number of pixels to project for each subsample.

member.name: M:ClearCanvas.ImageViewer.Core.Functions.MaximumIntensityProjection.ProjectOrthogonal(System.Byte*,System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)

member.param: The 3D volumetric slab to be projected. (Length must be exactly x ).
Buffer to receive the output 2D planar image. (Length must be exactly ).
The number of subsamples in the 3D volumetric slab.
The number of pixels per subsample in the 3D volumetric slab.
The offset, in pixels, into each subsample at which the projection will begin.
The number of pixels to project for each subsample.
